MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli. We had no advance warning of this however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a permanent repair on a transformer, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:15pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:37 PM on Friday, 22 January 2021.
